title: NFL Star Ndamukong Suh on Pro Athletes & Financial Literacy
description: Super Bowl champion and investor Ndamukong Suh joins Scott and Nora to talk about his football career and his other passions including a partnership with Stash, a virtual banking company that provides financial literacy in his hometown of Portland, Oregon.
itunes:title: NFL Star Ndamukong Suh on Pro Athletes & Financial Literacy
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: Plus: Some big ideas for cinnamon rolls. Watch out, Cinnabon!
